reviewText: After I had my baby, I didn't know how I was going to get back in shape.  I had already bought Shannon Miller's DVD for during pregnancy and loved it, so I decided to give this one a shot.  It did not disappoint me.  Great video!  I would recommend this DVD to any mom after having a baby to get back in shape.

First I should say that I was completely skeptical to order a workout DVD since I never use them more than once when I usually order them.  But since this one was endorsed by my youth idol and it was specific to losing baby weight & getting the post-baby body back, I decided to give it a shot.  Not only are these workouts fun, but they challenge me in a way that I can feel that I am getting a workout, but not overwhelmed with steps and strain.  My heart rate is elevated and I am challenged, and enjoy the trainer and Shannon (who are neither annoying or overly smiley like in most DVDs).  I highly recommend this for a postpartum woman.  Actually, I recommend it to anyone who wants a fun & quick workout.  I will use it well after I get my pre-baby body back.

Oh!!! I do want to mention that you should have some 3 pound (or similar) weights and an exercise ball if you are going to use this DVD. It wasn't mentioned anywhere in the description.

I kept up with Shannon's Fit Pregnancy Video throughout my pregnancy and loved it! So of course after my son was born and I wanted my old body back, I turned to Shannon! She's so encouraging and easy to work out with! I loved it! Getting my old body back wasn't as hard as I thought it was going to be! I really recommend this video!
